roleset.name: to advise

example.name: transitive
example.text: [The former $ 3 million-a-year lobbyist]-1 now frequents shelters for the homeless and devotes a third of his time [*-1] counseling other recovering alcoholics .

example.name: all arguments
example.text: Computer Sciences would n't disclose the proposed purchase price for Cleveland Consulting , which [*T*-1] counsels companies on logistics and supply .

example.name: with Arg2
example.text: Underneath the headline `` Diversification , '' it counsels , `` Based on the events of the past week , all investors need to know their portfolios are balanced to help protect them against the market 's volatility . ''
example.arg: "Based on the events of the past week , all investors need to know their portfolios are balanced to help protect them against the market 's volatility"

roleset.note: Based on WSJ. Member of VNcls advise-37.9-1.
